anime.description: In the 23rd century, a hidden group called Shadow is taking over the world. To fight against Shadow, billionaire Midoriyama Rei creates a secret organization called Circus. When she can`t find qualified pilots for Circus` main mecha, the Galvion, she cuts a deal with two convicts, Mu and Maya: they must lead the fight against Shadow and save innocents in exchange for years being cut from their long prison sentences. Source: Wikipedia Note: The show did not fare very well and had its planned number of episodes cut. A 23rd episode, then already partially completed, was never aired, and episode 22 had a 35-second epilogue tacked onto the end that explained the series` planned outcome via voice-over narration and stills.

tag.name: robot
tag.description: A robot is an automatically guided machine, able to do tasks on its own. Another common characteristic is that by its appearance or movements, a robot often conveys a sense that it has intent or agency of its own. Not to be confused with android (human-like robot).

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: mecha
tag.description: Mecha in Japanese basically means mechanical things; everything from an electric whisk or a car to a spaceship or a robot. Here however we limit it to the more exotic things usually referred to as mecha anime: robots, whether controlled by a human or not, and their ilk. See Androids, Piloted Robots, Power Suits, Robot Helpers, Transforming Robots for a more specific classification.

tag.name: transforming craft
tag.description: A transforming craft is an object built by humans or other intelligent lifeforms, usually a robot but sometimes also a vehicle of some sort, that can rearrange its parts in order to switch between a minimum of two forms.

tag.name: piloted robot
tag.description: Piloted Robots are, as the name suggests, robots that cannot control themselves; they need to be steered from somewhere, this can be from a human sitting inside or a remote controlled option.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Henry McMillan
character.description: The overarching antagonist of the series, Henry is a member of Shadow and is undoubtably the smartest member.

episode.title: 謎の大組織シャドウ
The Mysterious Organization: Shadow
Nazo no Daisoshiki Shadow
episode.summary: Muu and Maya, two convicts, are freed from jail by a billionare named Rei Midoriyama. The catch? They must pilot her mechas to earn points and eventually earn their freedom. Their first job is to deliver an anti-cancer serum to help a young girl, but they manage to get themselves caught up in some drama along the way…

episode.title: グランプリ大爆殺
The Explosion at the Grand Prix
Grand Prix Daibakusatsu
episode.summary: Muu and Maya are competeting in a race, with a new car and a prize pool of 20 million credits. However, Shadow is also competing, though their end goal isn`t the money...

episode.title: 超[スーパー]エンジン大奪還
The Super Engine Recovery
Super Engine Daidakkan
episode.summary: Muu, Maya, and Remi are sent to investigate the reclusive and standoffish Professor Morsel`s new invention - the Super Turbocharger. However, not only is Shadow also after the machine, they have help from someone on the inside...

episode.title: 大爆走ゲーム
The Explosive Game
Daibakusou Game
episode.summary: Muu and Maya are sent to deliver an important document. However, they`re intercepted by a motorcycle gang, who challenge Muu and Maya to a game in exchange for their freedom... or their lives.

episode.title: 死のニトロ大輸送
The Deadly Nitro Transport
Shi no Nitoro Daiyusou
episode.summary: Muu, tired of Rei`s constant badgering, strikes out on his own and gets a job as a cargo driver. However, what he doesn`t know is that the cargo he`s carrying could cost him his life... or Maya`s.

episode.title: 大暗殺 武器を捜せ
Search for the Assassination Weapon
Daiansatsu Buki o Sagase
episode.summary: A powerful, peace-loving senator is shot dead. Muu and Maya are sent to find out who is behind it, and what their motives are. Little do they know, they`ll find themselves trapped in a game with no way to win...

episode.title: ブル警官大追跡
Officer Bull`s Great Pursuit
Blue Keikan Daitsuiseki
episode.summary: Rei`s senior detective and friend Aramis has vanished. Meanwhile, Officer Brutus and Circus-1 chase a man wanted in connection with a drunk driving accident, only to find the two crimes are closely related...

episode.title: レイ緑山大暗殺指令
The Rei Midoriyama Assassination Order
Rei Midoriyama Daiansatsu Shirei
episode.summary: Rei attends a party, with Muu and Maya in tow as her chauffuers, completely unaware of a plot to take her life... Source: Inka-Subs

episode.title: 大噴出! 毒死鉱山
Eruption at the Poisonous Death Mine
Daifunshutsu! Dokushi Kouzan
episode.summary: Poisonous gas is leaking out of the Gordon Mine, leaving death and destruction in its path. Where is the gas coming from and what does it have to do with Teri`s father? Source: Inka-Subs

episode.title: 大いなる別れ
The Great Farewell
Ooinaru Wakare
episode.summary: Muu`s racing mentor, Gwen, returns from the seedy underbelly of the racing world. When Muu investigates, he`ll find out who Gwen came back for and what he intends to do... Source: Inka-Subs

episode.title: 大実験! 野望の兵器
The Great Experiment: Weapons of Ambition
Daijikken! Yabou no Heiki
episode.summary: Henry`s experiments with the unearthed Metal Battler attract the attention of both Remi and Mary J. Gordon. When Mary obtains pictures and threatens to go to Shadow with the evidence, she`ll quickly discover the true extent of Henry`s influence... Source: Inka-Subs

episode.title: 大戦慄! 人間狩り
Trembling with Fear! Human Hunting!
Daisenritsu! Ningen Kari
episode.summary: Details on the Dragon Company`s shady practices have emerged. As Dave Dragon plots his revenge, Circus will find themselves in the midst of a sinister game...

episode.title: 大登場! 超秘密兵器[メタルバトラー]
A Grand Appearance! The Metal Battler!
Daitoujou! Metal Battler
episode.summary: As tensions rise, Henry sets up a race to find potential pilots for the Metal Battler. But when Circus gets involved, they`ll learn finding pilots isn`t his only objective...

episode.title: 恋の戦場大ラリー
Rally on the Battlefield of Love
Koi no Senjou Dai Rally
episode.summary: With the Metal Battler`s owner at large, Muu and Maya find themselves in the middle of another of Shadow`s plots. But after agreeing to help a girl see her lover one last time, they`ll be putting more than just their lives on the line...

episode.title: 大電殺! 百万V[ボルト]の罠
Great Electricity Kill! The One-Million Volt Trap
Daidenya! Hyakuman Volt no Wana
基地爆破! 小犬大活躍
The Secret Base Explodes! A Very Active Puppy
Kichi Bakuha! Koinu Daikatsuyaku
霧の人工島・大海戦
The Artificial Island of Fog: Big Naval Battle
Kiri no Jinkou Tou: Daikaisen
